definition of bagellearner bagel image english bagel american bagel trendsbagel  b eɪ g əlword forms plural bagelscountable noun a bagel is a ringshaped bread roll cobuild advanced english dictionary copyright © harper collins publishers image of bagel© binh thanh bui shutterstockbagelin britishor beigel  ˈbeɪɡ əlnouna hard ringshaped bread roll characteristic of jewish baking collins english dictionary copyright © harper collins publishers word origin of bagel c20 from yiddish beygel ultimately from old high german boug ringbagelin american  ˈbeɪgəl bāˈgəlnouna chewy bread roll made of yeastdough twisted into a small doughnutlike shape cooked in simmering water then baked webster’s new world college dictionary 4th edition copyright © 2010 by houghton mifflin harcourt all rights reserved word origin of bagel ne yiddish beygl  mhg  bougel  austrian ger beugel kind of croissant akin to ger bügel stirrup orig ring  beugen to bend for ie base see bow 1trends of bagelused rarely bagel is in the lower 50 of commonly used words in the collins dictionary view usage for years frequency1770
